notes:
# Screen Demo v0.1.5 - Auto Zooms Update

## New Features
- Added automatic zooms
- Added project save/load
- Timeline updates:
  - New video track design
  - Added thumbnails
  - Added duration display
- Cursor improvements:
  - Added click animation
  - Added motion blur
  - Dynamic cursor type matching system cursor
  - Improved smoothness
  - Filtered small cursor movements
- Video recording improvements:
  - 120 FPS recording, 60 FPS export
  - Increased bitrate to 50Mbps
- Added custom background image upload
- Fixed background to zoom with content
- Added speed percentage in export
- Simplified quality options with smaller render size
- Added software update system
